segments.text: Hello . I am calling about the apartment you advertised .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what kind of apartment are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am interested in one-bedroom . Do you have any available ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have one . When you need it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometime around next week . What can you tell me about this apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , It's a one-bedroom apartment . The monthly rent at 650 dollars and a 300 dollars security deposit . You pay electricity only . Gas and water is included . Both the heat and stove are gas . Let me see , what else ... Oh , you'll be assigned a sheltered parking space at no extra charge . And that's probably it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds good . May I come over tomorrow to take a look ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What time would you like to come ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for calling , Blanca . I'll see you tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
